Description.Details: Unlike Inferno Rounds, Incendiary Missile ammunition replaces parts of the explosive warhead with a cheaper non-gelled incendiary agent, one similar to phoperus. While this effect is similar in principle to Inferno style rounds the effect is heavily mitigated by atmospheric conditions. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E. Left Click on Ammo count during battle to swap Ammo Type. Ctrl+click on ammunition counter to eject ammo.
Description.Name: MRM Incendiary Ammo
